roleset.name: (cause to) become abnormally lean
roleset.note: EMACIATE-V NOTES: Frame created by Claire (from emaciate.01-v)

role.descr: instrument or manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: Descriptive
example.text: How does such a rich voice emerge from an emaciated frame with an oversized balloon head balanced on top, cigarette hanging out?
